categories.title: Bali(Tanah Lot)
categories.description: The lush interiors of Bali boast volcanoes and mountains in the north through to Ubud’s calm and peaceful rice paddies. The popular beaches along the southern tip of the island all have their own charm with a perfect resort for everyone.
